alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 4:59AM EDT until September 03 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Tampa Bay Ruskin FL has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Florida... Hillsborough River Near Hillsborough River State Park affecting Hillsborough County. .Heavy rain over the last few days has caused the Hillsborough River near Hillsborough River State Park to rise. For the Hillsborough...including Morris Bridge, Temple Terrace, Hillsborough River State Park...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hillsborough River near Hillsborough River State Park. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Hillsborough River State Park may be closed. Lowland flooding occurs at the mobile home park near Branchton on State Road 579. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 10.6 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.7 feet on 09/07/1953. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (2 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Hillsborough River Hillsborough Rive 10.0 9.7 Fri 4 am 10.6 9.5 7.4 6.0 5.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM EDT.
